00035     public class Polynomial :
00036         IComparable,
00037         ICloneable
00038     {
00039         double[] coefficients;
00040         int order;
00041 
00046         public
00047         Polynomial(
00048             int order
00049             )
00050         {
00051             this.order = order;
00052             this.coefficients = new double[SizeOfOrder(order)];
00053         }
00054 
00059         public
00060         Polynomial(
00061             double[] coefficients
00062             )
00063         {
00064             this.order = FindOrder(coefficients);
00065             this.coefficients = new double[SizeOfOrder(order)];
00066             Array.Copy(
00067                 coefficients,
00068                 this.coefficients,
00069                 Math.Min(this.coefficients.Length, coefficients.Length)
00070                 );
00071         }
00072 
00077         public
00078         Polynomial(
00079             Polynomial copy
00080             )
00081         {
00082             this.order = copy.order;
00083             this.coefficients = new double[copy.coefficients.Length];
00084             Array.Copy(
00085                 copy.coefficients,
00086                 this.coefficients,
00087                 Math.Min(this.coefficients.Length, copy.coefficients.Length)
00088                 );
00089         }
00090 
00091         #region Size
00092 
00093         static
00094         int
00095         SizeOfOrder(
00096             int order
00097             )
00098         {
00099             return 1 << (int)Math.Ceiling(Math.Log(order + 1, 2));
00100         }
00101         
00102         // TODO: Never called, remove?
00110 
00111         void
00112         ResizeOptimalForOrder(
00113             int order
00114             )
00115         {
00116             int bestSize = SizeOfOrder(order);
00117             if(bestSize == coefficients.Length)
00118             {
00119                 return;
00120             }
00121 
00122             double[] newCoeffs = new double[bestSize];
00123             Array.Copy(
00124                 this.coefficients,
00125                 newCoeffs,
00126                 Math.Min(this.coefficients.Length, newCoeffs.Length)
00127                 );
00128             coefficients = newCoeffs;
00129         }
00130         
00131         void
00132         EnsureSupportForOrder(
00133             int order
00134             )
00135         {
00136             if(coefficients.Length <= order)
00137             {
00138                 ResizeOptimalForOrder(order);
00139             }
00140         }
00141 
00145         public
00146         void
00147         Normalize()
00148         {
00149             NormalizeOrder();
00150             ResizeOptimalForOrder(this.order);
00151         }
00152 
00153         void
00154         NormalizeOrder()
00155         {
00156             while(coefficients[order] == 0d && order > 0)
00157             {
00158                 order--;
00159             }
00160         }
00161 
00162         int
00163         FindOrder(
00164             double[] coeff
00165             )
00166         {
00167             int o = coeff.Length - 1;
00168             while(coeff[o] == 0d && order > 0)
00169             {
00170                 o--;
00171             }
00172 
00173             return o;
00174         }

00199         public double this[int power]
00200         {
00201             get
00202             {
00203                 if(power < 0)
00204                 {
00205                     throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("power", power, Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
00206                 }
00207 
00208                 if(power > order)
00209                 {
00210                     return 0d;
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 return coefficients[power];
00214             }
00215 
00216             set
00217             {
00218                 if(power < 0)
00219                 {
00220                     throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("power", power, Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
00221                 }
00222 
00223                 if(power > order)
00224                 {
00225                     EnsureSupportForOrder(power);
00226                 }
00227 
00228                 coefficients[power] = value;
00229             }
00230         }

00501         #region Inplace Arithmetic Methods

00505         public
00506         void
00507         AddInplace(
00508             Polynomial polynomial
00509             )
00510         {
00511             EnsureSupportForOrder(polynomial.Order);
00512             int len = Math.Min(order, polynomial.order) + 1;
00513             for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
00514             {
00515                 coefficients[i] += polynomial.coefficients[i];
00516             }
00517         }
00518 
00521         public
00522         void
00523         AddInplace(
00524             double n
00525             )
00526         {
00527             this[0] += n;
00528         }
00529 
00532         public
00533         void
00534         SubtractInplace(
00535             Polynomial polynomial
00536             )
00537         {
00538             EnsureSupportForOrder(polynomial.Order);
00539             int len = Math.Min(order, polynomial.order) + 1;
00540             for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
00541             {
00542                 coefficients[i] -= polynomial.coefficients[i];
00543             }
00544         }
00545 
00548         public
00549         void
00550         SubtractInplace(
00551             double n
00552             )
00553         {
00554             this[0] -= n;
00555         }
00556 
00559         public
00560         void
00561         NegateInplace()
00562         {
00563             for(int i = 0; i <= order; i++)
00564             {
00565                 coefficients[i] = -coefficients[i];
00566             }
00567         }

00573         public
00574         Polynomial
00575         MultiplySlow(
00576             Polynomial polynomial
00577             )
00578         {
00579             double[] coeff = new double[1 + Order + polynomial.Order];
00580             for(int i = 0; i <= order; i++)
00581             {
00582                 for(int j = 0; j <= polynomial.order; j++)
00583                 {
00584                     coeff[i + j] += coefficients[i] * polynomial.coefficients[j];
00585                 }
00586             }
00587 
00588             return new Polynomial(coeff);
00589         }
00590 
00597         public
00598         Polynomial
00599         Multiply(
00600             Polynomial polynomial
00601             )
00602         {
00603             int orderMin = Math.Min(Order, polynomial.Order);
00604             if(orderMin > 3)
00605             {
00606                 int orderMax = Math.Max(Order, polynomial.Order);
00607                 this.EnsureSupportForOrder(orderMax);
00608                 polynomial.EnsureSupportForOrder(orderMax);
00609 
00610                 return MultiplyKaratsuba(
00611                     this.coefficients,
00612                     polynomial.coefficients,
00613                     this.order,
00614                     polynomial.order,
00615                     SizeOfOrder(orderMax),
00616                     0
00617                     );
00618             }
00619             else
00620             {
00621                 double[] coeff = new double[1 + Order + polynomial.Order];
00622                 for(int i = 0; i <= order; i++)
00623                 {
00624                     for(int j = 0; j <= polynomial.order; j++)
00625                     {
00626                         coeff[i + j] += coefficients[i] * polynomial.coefficients[j];
00627                     }
00628                 }
00629 
00630                 return new Polynomial(coeff);
00631             }
00632         }
00633 
00634         Polynomial
00635         MultiplyKaratsuba(
00636             double[] leftCoefficients,
00637             double[] rightCoefficients,
00638             int leftOrder,
00639             int rightOrder,
00640             int n,
00641             int offset
00642             )
00643         {
00644             if(n == 1)
00645             {
00646                 return new Polynomial(new double[] { leftCoefficients[offset] * rightCoefficients[offset] });
00647             }
00648 
00649             if(n == 2)
00650             {
00651                 return new Polynomial(
00652                     new double[] {
00653                         leftCoefficients[offset] * rightCoefficients[offset],
00654                         leftCoefficients[offset] * rightCoefficients[offset + 1] + leftCoefficients[offset + 1] * rightCoefficients[offset],
00655                         leftCoefficients[offset + 1] * rightCoefficients[offset + 1]
00656                     });
00657             }
00658 
00659             n >>= 1;
00660             double[] FF = new double[n], GG = new double[n];
00661             for(int i = offset; i < n + offset; i++)
00662             {
00663                 FF[i - offset] = leftCoefficients[i] + leftCoefficients[n + i];
00664                 GG[i - offset] = rightCoefficients[i] + rightCoefficients[n + i];
00665             }
00666 
00667             Polynomial FG0 = MultiplyKaratsuba(
00668                 leftCoefficients,
00669                 rightCoefficients,
00670                 n - 1,
00671                 n - 1,
00672                 n,
00673                 offset
00674                 );
00675 
00676             Polynomial FG1 = MultiplyKaratsuba(
00677                 leftCoefficients,
00678                 rightCoefficients,
00679                 Math.Max(leftOrder - n, 0),
00680                 Math.Max(rightOrder - n, 0),
00681                 n,
00682                 offset + n
00683                 );
00684 
00685             Polynomial FFGG = MultiplyKaratsuba(
00686                 FF,
00687                 GG,
00688                 n - 1,
00689                 n - 1,
00690                 n,
00691                 0
00692                 );
00693 
00694             FFGG.SubtractInplace(FG0);
00695             FFGG.SubtractInplace(FG1);
00696             FFGG.MultiplyShiftInplace(n);
00697 
00698             FG1.MultiplyShiftInplace(n + n);
00699             FG1.AddInplace(FFGG);
00700             FG1.AddInplace(FG0);
00701 
00702             return FG1;
00703         }
00704 
00709         public
00710         void
00711         MultiplyInplace(
00712             double c0
00713             )
00714         {
00715             for(int i = 0; i < coefficients.Length; i++)
00716             {
00717                 coefficients[i] = c0 * coefficients[i];
00718             }
00719         }
00720 
00725         public
00726         void
00727         MultiplyShiftInplace(
00728             int n
00729             )
00730         {
00731             if(n <= 0)
00732             {
00733                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("n", n, Resources.ArgumentPositive);
00734             }
00735 
00736             EnsureSupportForOrder(order + n);
00737             order += n;
00738 
00739             for(int i = order; i >= n; i--)
00740             {
00741                 coefficients[i] = coefficients[i - n];
00742             }
00743 
00744             for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00745             {
00746                 coefficients[i] = 0;
00747             }
00748         }
00749 
00756         public
00757         void
00758         MultiplySyntheticInplace(
00759             double a
00760             )
00761         {
00762             EnsureSupportForOrder(order + 1);
00763             order++;
00764             coefficients[order] = coefficients[order - 1];
00765 
00766             for(int j = order - 1; j >= 1; j--)
00767             {
00768                 coefficients[j] = coefficients[j - 1] - a * coefficients[j];
00769             }
00770 
00771             coefficients[0] *= -a;
00772         }
00773 
00778         public
00779         void
00780         MultiplyLinearInplace(
00781             double c0,
00782             double c1
00783             )
00784         {
00785             if(Number.AlmostZero(c1))
00786             {
00787                 MultiplyInplace(c0);
00788                 return;
00789             }
00790 
00791             double a = -c0 / c1;
00792             MultiplySyntheticInplace(a);
00793             MultiplyInplace(c1);
00794         }

00802         Divide(
00803             Polynomial polynomial
00804             )
00805         {
00806             return new Rational(Clone(), polynomial.Clone());
00807         }
00808 
00813         public
00814         void
00815         DivideInplace(
00816             double c0
00817             )
00818         {
00819             if(Number.AlmostZero(c0))
00820             {
00821                 throw new DivideByZeroException();
00822             }
00823 
00824             double factor = 1 / c0;
00825             for(int i = 0; i <= order; i++)
00826             {
00827                 coefficients[i] = coefficients[i] * factor;
00828             }
00829         }
00830 
00835         public
00836         void
00837         DivideShiftInplace(
00838             int n,
00839             out double[] reminder
00840             )
00841         {
00842             if(n <= 0)
00843             {
00844                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("n", n, Resources.ArgumentPositive);
00845             }
00846 
00847             reminder = new double[n];
00848             for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00849             {
00850                 reminder[i] = coefficients[i];
00851             }
00852 
00853             order -= n;
00854             for(int i = 0; i < order; i++)
00855             {
00856                 coefficients[i] = coefficients[i + n];
00857             }
00858 
00859             for(int i = order; i < order + n; i++)
00860             {
00861                 coefficients[i] = 0;
00862             }
00863 
00864             if((n << 2) > order)
00865             {
00866                 Normalize();
00867             }
00868         }
00869 
00876         public
00877         void
00878         DivideSyntheticInplace(
00879             double a,
00880             out double reminder
00881             )
00882         {
00883             double swap;
00884             reminder = coefficients[order];
00885             coefficients[order--] = 0;
00886             for(int i = order; i >= 0; i--)
00887             {
00888                 swap = coefficients[i];
00889                 coefficients[i] = reminder;
00890                 reminder = swap + a * reminder;
00891             }
00892 
00893             NormalizeOrder();
00894         }
00895 
00900         public
00901         void
00902         DivideLinearInplace(
00903             double c0,
00904             double c1,
00905             out double reminder
00906             )
00907         {
00908             if(Number.AlmostZero(c1))
00909             {
00910                 DivideInplace(c0);
00911                 reminder = 0d;
00912                 return;
00913             }
00914 
00915             double a = -c0 / c1;
00916             DivideInplace(c1);
00917             DivideSyntheticInplace(a, out reminder);
00918         }
00919         #endregion
00920 
00921         #region Evaluation
00922 
00928         public
00929         double
00930         Evaluate(
00931             double value
00932             )
00933         {
00934             double ret = coefficients[order];
00935             for(int j = order - 1; j >= 0; j--)
00936             {
00937                 ret = ret * value + coefficients[j];
00938             }
00939 
00940             return ret;
00941         }
00942 
00950         public
00951         double
00952         Evaluate(
00953             double value,
00954             out double derivative
00955             )
00956         {
00957             double ret = coefficients[order];
00958             derivative = 0d;
00959             for(int j = order - 1; j >= 0; j--)
00960             {
00961                 derivative = derivative * value + ret;
00962                 ret = ret * value + coefficients[j];
00963             }
00964 
00965             return ret;
00966         }
00967 
00975         public
00976         double[]
00977         Evaluate(
00978             double value,
00979             int derivativeOrderMax
00980             )
00981         {
00982             double[] ret = new double[derivativeOrderMax + 1];
00983             ret[0] = coefficients[order];
00984 
00985             int len;
00986             for(int i = order - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00987             {
00988                 len = Math.Min(derivativeOrderMax, coefficients.Length - 1 - i);
00989                 for(int j = len; j >= 1; j--)
00990                 {
00991                     ret[j] = ret[j] * value + ret[j - 1];
00992                 }
00993 
00994                 ret[0] = ret[0] * value + coefficients[i];
00995             }
00996 
00997             double factorial = 1.0;
00998             for(int i = 2; i < ret.Length; i++)
00999             {
01000                 factorial *= i;
01001                 ret[i] *= factorial;
01002             }
01003 
01004             return ret;
01005         }

01008 
01009         #region String Formatting and Parsing
01010 
01014         public
01015         string
01016         ToString(
01017             string baseVariable
01018             )
01019         {
01020             StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
01021             for(int i = Order; i >= 0; i--)
01022             {
01023                 double coeff = coefficients[i];
01024 
01025                 if(Number.AlmostZero(coeff))
01026                 {
01027                     continue;
01028                 }
01029 
01030                 if(builder.Length > 0)
01031                 {
01032                     builder.Append(coeff > 0d ? " + " : " - ");
01033                 }
01034                 else
01035                 {
01036                     if(coeff < 0d)
01037                     {
01038                         builder.Append('-');
01039                     }
01040                 }
01041 
01042                 if(!Number.AlmostEqual(coeff, 1) && !Number.AlmostEqual(coeff, -1) || i == 0)
01043                 {
01044                     builder.Append(Math.Abs(coeff));
01045                 }
01046 
01047                 if(i > 0)
01048                 {
01049                     builder.Append(" " + baseVariable);
01050                 }
01051 
01052                 if(i > 1)
01053                 {
01054                     builder.Append('^');
01055                     builder.Append(i);
01056                 }
01057             }
01058 
01059             if(builder.Length == 0)
01060             {
01061                 builder.Append('0');
01062             }
01063 
01064             return builder.ToString();
01065         }
01066 
01070         public override
01071         string
01072         ToString()
01073         {
01074             return ToString("x");
01075         }

01079         #region .NET Integration: Hashing, Equality, Ordering, Cloning
01080 
01084         public override
01085         int
01086         GetHashCode()
01087         {
01088             return coefficients.GetHashCode();
01089         }

01095         bool
01096         Equals(
01097             object obj
01098             )
01099         {
01100             Polynomial p = obj as Polynomial;
01101             return p == null ? false : Equals(p);
01102         }

01108         bool
01109         Equals(
01110             Polynomial polynomial
01111             )
01112         {
01113             return CompareTo(polynomial) == 0;
01114         }

01119         public static
01120         bool
01121         Equals(
01122             Polynomial polynomial1,
01123             Polynomial polynomial2
01124             )
01125         {
01126             if(polynomial1 == null)
01127             {
01128                 return polynomial2 == null;
01129             }
01130 
01131             return polynomial1.Equals(polynomial2);
01132         }
01133 
01137         public
01138         int
01139         CompareTo(
01140             object obj
01141             )
01142         {
01143             if(obj == null)
01144             {
01145                 return 1;
01146             }
01147 
01148             if(!(obj is Polynomial))
01149             {
01150                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentTypeMismatch, "obj");
01151             }
01152 
01153             return CompareTo((Polynomial)obj);
01154         }
01155 
01159         public
01160         int
01161         CompareTo(
01162             Polynomial polynomial
01163             )
01164         {
01165             int i = this.Order;
01166             int j = polynomial.Order;
01167 
01168             if(i > j)
01169             {
01170                 return 1;
01171             }
01172 
01173             if(j > i)
01174             {
01175                 return -1;
01176             }
01177 
01178             while(i >= 0)
01179             {
01180                 if(this.coefficients[i] > polynomial.coefficients[i])
01181                 {
01182                     return 1;
01183                 }
01184 
01185                 if(this.coefficients[i] < polynomial.coefficients[i])
01186                 {
01187                     return -1;
01188                 }
01189 
01190                 i--;
01191             }
01192 
01193             return 0;
01194         }

01201         {
01202             return Clone();
01203         }

01209         Polynomial
01210         Clone()
01211         {
